name: 5 Minutes Late
description:
Oh no! You're late for class but your friends have stolen your stuff! Quick, find everything before the late bell rings!\

*Note: it looks/works best in full screen.

How to play:

A,S,W,D or the arrow keys - Movement

E - Pick up something or examine it

Q - Access Inventory

Hello there! Here is the game I've been working on for the past few months. This is not a finished product so not all the features (a timer, win/lose game notification, etc.) are not present and there are a few bugs (ie: the ball hitting you with the same exact force you hit it with). I plan to add in these features and fix these bugs in future updates to this game (well maybe not the ball bug since it's kind of fun).

Thank you for checking out my game!

If you'd like to see some in-progress videos of this game, check out my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXXxQJo31tm-CDwcw1vu0AA
